description: It is an intelligent ecosystem that no longer has a monopoly center, is completely self-driven, and realizes self-reward and punishment mechanisms. In SAC application pool, there are various blockchain application scenarios including insurance, communication, finance, trading games, supply chain and enterprise service.insurance, communication, finance, trading games, supply chain and enterprise service. In the SAC ecology, data generation, data processing and data usage are all based on decentralized system.
name: Smart Application Coin
